886310.name: The Island Combat
886310.description:
The Island Combat is an action-packed game with various difficulty levels, allowing you to adapt and take on challenges. Engage with other players through online chat and utilize a special slow-motion ability.

Story

James lived a peaceful life with his brother on a secluded island until a group of criminals discovered a treasure map from ancient pirates. As news spread, their lives turned chaotic with treasure hunters invading the island. Will you defend your home from these unwanted visitors?

Features:

  • Use slow-motion combat skills to control time.

Time is running out—defend your island!
886310.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
